Instruction: In a small bowl, combine softened butter, minced garlic, chopped parsley, olive oil, and salt. If using parmesan cheese or garlic powder, add them to the mixture at this point.
Cut the French bread loaf in half lengthwise.
Spread the garlic butter mixture evenly over the cut sides of the bread.
Place the bread halves on a baking sheet, cut side facing up.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the bread is toasted through.
Broil for an additional 1-2 minutes for a crispier crust (optional).
Let cool slightly before slicing and serving.
